query: UPDATE buildPhases SET tasks = '["Prepare walls and ceilings for plastering", "Apply base coat of plaster to all walls", "Apply finishing coat and smooth surfaces", "Sand and prepare plastered surfaces for painting"]' WHERE jobId = 390002 AND phaseName = 'Plastering'
